text:
@realDonaldTrump Sorry, 'Mr Trumpee Retard', what are you trying to say??

Howz that "#CoronaVirus will be gone by Summer" thing working out for you?? 

I hope being responsible for the deaths of thousands isn't stopping you sleeping or golfing?

#PrisonerOne
